## chooseLocalFile() function

选择本地文件

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function chooseLocalFile(accept: string, changeCb: (FileList: any) => any): void;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                      | Description              |
| --------- | ------------------------- | ------------------------ |
| accept    | string                    | 上传的文件类型，用于过滤 |
| changeCb  | (FileList: any) =&gt; any | 选择文件回调             |

**Returns:**

void
